DiffuseConservation
  globals [ glob1 ]
  O> ask patches with [ abs pxcor = max-pxcor or abs pycor = max-pycor ][ set pcolor red ]
  O> set glob1 sum [pcolor] of patches
  O> diffuse pcolor 0.5
  abs( glob1 - sum [pcolor] of patches ) < 0.000000001 => true
